author: Jacob Koshy
title: Pench tiger death raises COVID-19 fears
description: NTCA mulls test after a big cat tested positive for the virus in a U.S. zoo
content: The spectre of COVID-19 has made its appearance in one of Indias most storied tiger reserves. The death of a 10-year-old ailing male tiger, in the Pench Tiger Reserve (PTR) the countrys most munificent reserve that succumbed to a respiratory illness last Satu… [+3272 chars]
